BOT  - NAME PORT ID SECRET
function 62
func:
var jsondata;
var hash = msg.payload.split(':').map(item=>item.trim());
msg.hash = hash[1];
msg.port = msg.port;
msg.user = msg.user;
msg.filepath = "/rules/bots/" +msg.user+ "/.node-red/settings.js";

jsondata = 
    'module.exports = {\n' +
        'uiPort: process.env.PORT || '+msg.port+',\n' +
        'mqttReconnectTime: 15000,\n' +
        'serialReconnectTime: 15000,\n' +
        'debugMaxLength: 1000,\n' +

        'flowFile: '+"'flows_"+msg.user+".json'"+',\n' +
        'userDir: '+"'/rules/bots/"+msg.user+"/.node-red/'"+',\n' +
        'nodesDir: '+"'/rules/bots/"+msg.user+"/.node-red/nodes'"+',\n' +

        'adminAuth: {\n' +
            'type: "credentials",\n' +
            'users: [\n' +
              '  {\n' +
             '       username: "ibbroothere",\n' +
            '        password: "$2b$08$IWR/p.zn8QxfpYjNVSIm9.E/Wg/9VUmeRtRGaWJ3V8lYGQcxPSnxW",\n' +
           '         permissions: "*"\n' +
          '      }\n' +
         '   ]\n' +
        '},\n' +

        'httpNodeAuth: { user: "'+msg.user+'", pass: "'+ hash[1] +'" },\n' +

        'functionGlobalContext: {\n' +
        '},\n' +
        'logging: {\n' +
            'console: {\n' +
            '    level: "info",\n' +
           '     metrics: false,\n' +
          '      audit: false\n' +
         '   }\n' +
        '}\n' +
    '}\n'

msg.payload = jsondata;

return msg;

var jsondata;
var hash = msg.payload.split(':').map(item=>item.trim());
msg.hash = hash[1];
msg.port = msg.port;
msg.user = msg.user;
//msg.id = "IBB_bot/3";

jsondata = 
    'module.exports = {\n' +
        'uiPort: process.env.PORT || '+msg.port+',\n' +
        'mqttReconnectTime: 15000,\n' +
        'serialReconnectTime: 15000,\n' +
        'debugMaxLength: 1000,\n' +

        'flowFile: '+"'flows_user3.json'"+',\n' +
        'userDir: '+"'/rules/users/user3/.node-red/'"+',\n' +
        'nodesDir: '+"'/rules/users/user3/.node-red/nodes'"+',\n' +

        'adminAuth: {\n' +
            'type: "credentials",\n' +
            'users: [\n' +
              '  {\n' +
             '       username: "ibbroothere",\n' +
            '        password: "$2b$08$IWR/p.zn8QxfpYjNVSIm9.E/Wg/9VUmeRtRGaWJ3V8lYGQcxPSnxW",\n' +
           '         permissions: "*"\n' +
          '      }\n' +
         '   ]\n' +
        '},\n' +

        'httpNodeAuth: { user: "'+msg.user+'", pass: "'+ hash[1] +'" },\n' +

        'functionGlobalContext: {\n' +
        '},\n' +
        'logging: {\n' +
            'console: {\n' +
            '    level: "info",\n' +
           '     metrics: false,\n' +
          '      audit: false\n' +
         '   }\n' +
        '}\n' +
    '}\n'

msg.payload = jsondata;

return msg;
